thread.title: Djokovic-Nadal Final Set
thread.title_full: Djokovic-Nadal Final Set - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: Djokovic-Nadal Final Set
text:
Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal will renew their rivalry in the China Open final in Beijing on Sunday after both won their Saturday semifinals. The top-ranked Djokovic improved his record at the tournament to 28-0 with a 6-2, 6-3 win over David Ferrer, while Nadal beat Fabio Fognini, 7-5, 6-3.
In women’s play, Timea Bacsinszky defeated Ana Ivanovic, 5-7, 6-4, 6-1, to reach the final. She will play Garbiñe Muguruza, who defeated Agnieszka Radwanska, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4.
■ The unseeded Benoît Paire beat the defending champion, Kei Nishikori, 1-6, 6-4, 6-2, to advance to the Japan Open final in Tokyo. Paire will face top-seeded Stan Wawrinka, a 6-4, 7-6 (5) winner over Gilles Müller.
